activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13988
activity.text:
@itsArnavPrasad Hai , i would like to work on this issue

The root cause is that after saving, the browser history still contains the Edit page, so clicking Back from the preview goes back to Edit.

The proposed fix is:

In ProductKnowledgeâ€™s update mutation onSuccess, call navigate with { replace: true } to replace the current history entry (Edit page) with the Preview page.

In the Previewâ€™s Back button, simply do normal back navigation.

This ensures the history looks like: List â†’ Preview, so Back from Preview goes to List, not Edit.

ETA : 1 day after assigned

icon support actually requires updates across multiple interconnected files such as genericFilter.tsx, filterConfigs.tsx, and MultiFilter.tsx.These files collectively define filter data, UI rendering of filter options, and the overall filter dropdown menu.
The changes ensure icons appear consistently wherever filters are rendered â€” in tabs, dropdowns, option lists, and selected badges
